html:
Boo, No OnePlus 13T for the US

We may earn a commission when you click links to retailers and purchase goods. More info.

Well, I guess we’re officially done talking about the OnePlus 13T, a smaller flagship phone that looked like a device so many of us would consider if it came to the US. Unfortunately, it’s not coming to the US.

OnePlus confirmed the The Verge that they have no plans to release the phone here. Boo.

Pixel 10, hurry it up and launch.

5  Comments
